Reviews.Title: Totally AWSOME!!!
Reviews.Author: curley
Reviews.Content: This is the second phone like this I have owned.  It's awesome! It is VERY easy to use and that's what I like about it.

Reviews.Title: behold 2
Reviews.Author: torry "latorry boston"
Reviews.Content: ok firs of all i love this phone i use to with t-mobile and had it so if the phone was right i am sure i would have love it but it just so happens that this is not the case the phone all missed up u can not even put a sd card in it and the most important thing it is not unlocked i can not do nothing with the phone at all then you email the seller he or she do not reply so if they have any other things on here they are trying to sell i will not be buying

Reviews.Title: Samsung behold 2
Reviews.Author: mm123
Reviews.Content: This phone does not work well. It was a waste of money. I wish I had purchased another phone. If you are buying this phone, do your research.

ProductInfo.Features:
Quick access to Google functions with Android
Easy access to multimedia with 3D Cube Navigation
Better viewing with 3.2" widescreen display
Capture high-res pictures with built-in 5.0 MP camera
ProductInfo.Name: Unlocked Samsung Android Behold 2 T939 Cell Phone
